articles.title: Kyle Busch Bluntly Reveals What Makes $116 Million-Worth North Wilkesboro “By Far the Worst” Track as We Approach The All-Star Weekend - EssentiallySports
articles.description: Ahead of the upcoming All-Star race at the legendary North Wilkesboro Speedway, Kyle Busch talks about one major problem with the track.
articles.content: The NASCAR community is abuzz with anticipation for the forthcoming race at the North Wilkesboro. The famed track has been resurrected and restored to racing standards, sparking joy among fans and dr… [+3434 chars]
